summary: Yet another bunch of followers for skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds three followers into the world of skyrim. The followers are all marriable and will level with the player and have been given several perks (e.g. lightfoot). Two of the followers are female and are named Fiona and Jessica, whilst the other follower Kane is obviously male.
All of the followers use vanilla voice types which you can change yourself if you don't like the voice type i chose. I recommend using Vanilla voice expansion and/or RDO to get the best experience with any follower mod you use. The body types used in this mod are designed for UNP but should work for vanilla body also. This follower mod has been tested with EFF and can confirm that all three followers can follow the player. Kane and Jessica are Imperials with melee fighting skills but no spells and Fiona is a nord sorceror who starts off with a few spells. All Followers included in this mod are standalone and are set as essential. Feel free to modify or alter this mod in any way you like, also feel free to upload this onto the steam network, no need to ask for permisson.        


Recommended Mods :
These mods are recommended in order to get the followers to look the same in your game:Apachii Sky Hair by Apachii
Eyes of Beauty by Lograam
Pretty Face by tktk
Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy
Faces-Gennox faces without beard by Chris57 & FavouredSoul
Gennox Underwear (slip) for male body by Chris57 & FavouredSoul
XP32- Maximum skeleton by xp32
UNP Body Base by dimon99
Racemenu by Expired

Credits :
All of the mods listed above that made this follower mod possible, and thanks to the authors great works that make simple mods like this possible.
author: hooperdragon
